product_description: Worry less about pesky mosquitoes and ticks and spend more time enjoying the outdoors with Repel® brand. Repel® Insect Repellent Sportsmen Max Formula® 40% DEET repels mosquitoes, ticks, gnats, biting flies, chiggers and fleas. With 40% DEET, this insect repellent repels mosquitoes that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses. A reliable repellent for any family adventure, the easy-to-use aerosol spray stores nicely with outdoor gear or in your backpack. Take it everywhere for effective, long-lasting protection. DEET has been used as an insect repellent in the United States for more than 50 years. It’s recommended for those spending longer periods of time outdoors. Recommended by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for effective, long-lasting protection against mosquitoes, DEET is also an effective repellent for ticks. DEET-based products are available in a wide variety of Repel® formulas, including aerosols, sprays and wipes.

name: Repel Plant-Based Lemon Eucalyptus Insect Repellent, 4 Ounces, DEET-Free Pump Insect Repellent Repels Mosquitoes For 6 Hours With Plant-Based Ingredients, 2 Pack
short_description: REPELS MOSQUITOES: Repels mosquitoes that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses.
DEET-FREE* FORMULA: This product harnesses the power of Oil of Lemon Eucalyptus.
PROTECTS FOR UP TO 6 HOURS: This repellent keeps you and your family protected for hours, so the outdoor fun doesn't have to end. Not to be used on children under 3 years.
REFRESHING SCENT: This DEET-free* personal repellent leaves you with a cool, refreshing scent so you don't have to put up with the “usual bug spray” smell.
NOT GREASY OR STICKY: Provides protection without leaving your skin feeling sticky or greasy.
product_description: Outdoor enthusiasts know that when the going gets tough, so should their insect repellent. However extreme the activity or terrain, there's a Repel insect repellent designed to offer dependable coverage that lasts as long as you need it to. Repel products make effective mosquito protection simple under any circumstance—so you can heed the call of the wild wherever the trail takes you. DEET-free Repel Plant-Based Lemon Eucalyptus Insect Repellent provides protection for a range of activities, from your backyard to your travel destinations. Find a bug spray that fits your needs and enjoy protection that lasts for hours. This formula is made with oil of lemon eucalyptus, a plant-based ingredient that is recommended by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. This insect repellent won't leave you greasy or sticky, making it a great spray-and-go option for busy weekends. Repel mosquitoes that may transmit the Zika, West Nile, Dengue and Chikungunya viruses without the DEET. If you’re looking for a DEET-free alternative to create a mosquito barrier, then oil of lemon eucalyptus is a great option. Derived from the leaves of the Eucalyptus citriodora tree, oil of lemon eucalyptus repels mosquitoes for up to six hours. You can use oil of lemon eucalyptus-based products on children 3 years and older.

name: OFF! Clean Feel Insect Repellent Aerosol with 20% Picaridin - Long-Lasting DEET-Free Protection from Mosquitoes, Fragrance-Free Pest Control For Ticks & Flies, Camping, Bug Spray - 5 oz
short_description: Fragrance-Free Comfort – Experience the benefits of fragrance-free picaridin bug spray – Clean Feel insect repellent feels good on skin, leaving your skin feeling natural and non-sticky, so you can enjoy nature without heavy residue – and won’t stain or discolor your clothing.

Up to 8 Hours of Protection – Say goodbye to pesky insects! This long-lasting bug spray offers robust protection against mosquitos for up to 8 hours, when used as directed, allowing you to savor all of your outdoor adventures worry-free and fully engaged.

Camping, Hiking, Fishing? Off! Clean Feel Has You Covered – Enjoy the great outdoors without the bother of mosquitoes, ticks, and biting flies! Our bug spray is proven effective when used as directed, keeping you protected from mosquito bites and empowered to explore. Make this picaridin insect repellent part of your travel essentials and camping essentials.

Easy Application – Simplify your outdoor routine with our easy-to-apply aerosol. Its Aerosol delivery makes application a breeze and provides easy application via continuous sweeping motion – so you can spend less time prepping and more time enjoying your time outside.

Picaridin Formula – Our innovative formula boasts 20% picaridin, ensuring an effective defense against mosquitoes when used as directed. Picaridin is a DEET-free insect repellant that dries quickly with no oily residue. *DEET-free should not be viewed as a statement on the safety of this product relative to any product containing DEET

Feels Good On Skin – Feel good about your bug repellent! This spray provides protection when used as directed, it dries quickly, protects from mosquitoes, ticks and biting flies, all with no sticky residue - allowing you to focus on the fun ahead rather than those pesky insects.
product_description: Off! Clean Feel fragrance-free picaridin bug spray is crafted to offer you an effective bug repellent, when used as directed – allowing you to relish nature without distraction. Designed with your comfort in mind, this spray dries quickly, ensuring that your skin feels smooth and non-sticky – and it will not stain or discolor your clothing. With up to 8 hours of protection against mosquitoes (when used as directed) – Off! Clean Feel bug spray protects from unwelcome guests like mosquitoes, ticks, and biting flies. Whether you’re hiking through lush forests, enjoying a family picnic, or simply relaxing on your patio, you can feel confident and liberated, free to immerse yourself in the beauty of your surroundings. This long-lasting aerosol  allows you to engage fully in every moment, empowering you to explore without the nagging concern of insect bites pestering your enjoyment. Our picaridin-based formula provides a formidable defense against those annoying flying nuisances. Off! Clean Feel Picaridin spray does not stain fabrics and is designed to be easy to apply. The aerosol design simplifies your outdoor prep, letting you spend less time fumbling with applicators and more time making memories. This picaridin insect repellant spray formula ensures long lasting  protection from mosquitoes, allowing you to confidently protect yourself and your loved ones from insects. With just a few quick sprays, you’ll be ready to truly embrace your adventures, focusing on the thrill of exploration rather than unwanted bites. Prepare for your next outing with our fragrance-free picaridin bug spray—the essential outdoor companion that lets you connect with nature – uninterrupted. Enjoy the freedom to wander, play, and explore, knowing that lasting protection is just a spray away. Rediscover the joys of the outdoors, and create unforgettable memories free from insect distractions!
